questionTitle: Have I ________ you about how Mary is getting on at college?
"The Sting" is by ________ the best Robert Redford film I have seen.
Many elderly people have to live on the money they ________ when they were working.
You shouldn't call your superior ________ his first name.
I've had replies to our invitations from everyone ________ from Jane.
I had to get up early, ________ I'd have missed the train.
I ________ you to drive carefully today. The roads are icy.
I wanted to go home but my girlfriend ________ on going to a nightclub.
The house ________ beside the lake.
After the revolution, the people of Haiti ________ revenge on the secret police.
Much stricter ________ must now be taken at all airports.
Betty dances really ________, doesn't she?
The decision is yours, but I'd prefer you not ________ home until you're older.
The accident was terrible, because there was no doctor ________ to help.
________ is known about the side-effects of the new drug.
If I got his letter, I ________ his address.
Well we did have a terrible row but we've ________ it up now.
It was ________ that he happened to walk in just as we were discussing him.
In ________ of rage he tried to kill his own brother.
He was in his late fifties, with staring eyes and a ________ hairline.
